short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides collaborative viewing for NRK

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an experiment for the Covid-19 pandemic, allowing people to collaboratively view content from the Norwegian broadcaster NRK. Start playing a video as normal, press the share button (it will pause) and choose "synkron deling". Share the link. NOTE: Twitter, Facebook and EMail sharing are not likely to work, please use "kopier"/"copy" link and send it manually. 

Update: fixed some minor issues, should now also work on Chrome on Macs.
